name: ibm-q-studio
description: VSCode extension to develop using IBM Q suite
author: IBM Research

scripts.clean:server: cd server && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:client: cd client && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.compile:client: cd client && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm-run-all -s installServer compile && cd ..
scripts.watch:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -w -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test && cd..
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.package: npm run compile && cd client && vsce package && cd ..
